name: UpdateHelpCenterSection
description:
Update the details of a help center section.

Use this tool to update the information of a specific section in the help center by specifying the section ID.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the section assigned by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the section which is given by Intercom.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the Intercom API version to use for the request. Accepts versions 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: section_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON object with the section name, parent_id, and translated content details for the section update.

name.description: The name of the collection. For multilingual collections, this will be the name of the default language's content.

parent_id.description: The id for the collection this section will be within.

name.description: The name of the collection or section.

description.description: The description of the collection. Only available for collections.
